para.text: On November 1st of each year, the Mayor shall submit to the Council a report on all District of Columbia Highway Trust Fund and Local Transportation Fund expenditures for the previous fiscal year. The report shall include, but not be limited to, the following:
The number and location of each street, alley, sidewalk, curb, gutter and streetlight renovated, repaired, or maintained during the past fiscal year; and
The amount of the expenditure for each project.
